sentences: Kuulis oma nime mainitavat ning t천usis p체sti.
Kui n채ed teda, siis maini, et ma homme ei tule.
Ta pole oma kavatsusest kellelegi s천nagi maininud.
context: "Maininud" is the past participle form of Estonian verb "mainima." It means "mentioned" or "having mentioned." The word indicates that someone has brought something up in conversation, named, or stated something. In this case, it's in the perfect tense indicating a completed action in the past.
